remarks: Rule used to change bound variables, using implicit substitition. (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 25-May-2011.)
statement:
cbvalh.1 $e |- ( ph -> A. y ph ) $.
cbvalh.2 $e |- ( ps -> A. x ps ) $.
cbvalh.3 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
cbvalh $p |- ( A. x ph <-> A. y ps ) $.
